OM_Shadowheart_COM.synopsis: If Shar/Shadowheart have told the player about the Spear of Night, they will be given once last reminder to find it before entering the Shadowfell. If the player refuses twice, SH will turn hostileCOM: Shadowheart refuses to enter the Shadowfell without the spear. If the player refuses to search for it then Shadowheart leaves the party
OM_Shadowheart_COM.how_to_trigger: Use the Shadowfell teleporter at SCL_Main_A: -717; -60; -856 with Shadowheart in the party

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM.synopsis: Spear AOM/OOM: Shar reveals the final step to Shadowheart. She must kill the Selunite, Nightsong, and rise as Shar's loyal servant. No spear AOM: Shar reminds Shadowheart to find the spear. The player (as SH) can choose whether or not to find the spear, and can enter the Shadowfell without the spearNo spear OOM: Shar reminds Shadowheart to get the spear.
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM.how_to_trigger: Use the Shadowfell teleporter at SCL_Main_A: -717; -60; -856 with Shadowheart in the party

OM_Shadowheart_COM_24.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_24.text: This must be the last step. I need to pray. Only by Lady Shar's grace did we even make it this far.
OM_Shadowheart_COM_24.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart kneels before the pool and bows her head in prayer.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_30.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_30.text: I do. I'm amazed you missed the signs, honestly.
OM_Shadowheart_COM_30.context: NodeContext: All business. The player failed to learn she worships Shar until quite late in the story, beyond the point where secrecy matters.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_52.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_52.text: Now let me pray. This is important.
OM_Shadowheart_COM_52.context: NodeContext: All business. The player failed to learn she worships Shar until quite late in the story, beyond the point where secrecy matters.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_33.speaker: Narrator
OM_Shadowheart_COM_33.text: *Nothing. Shadowheart continues her prayer in silence.*

OM_Shadowheart_COM_64.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_64.text: There'll be time to pray later - let's move.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_10.speaker: Narrator
OM_Shadowheart_COM_10.text: *She pays you no heed, remaining on her knees.*

OM_Shadowheart_COM_34.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_34.text: Use the power of the parasite. Feel inside Shadowheart's mind.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_17.speaker: Narrator
OM_Shadowheart_COM_17.text: *You feel your mind slip into Shadowheart's - but you are not the only one present. There is another - ancient, commanding, rendered from purest darkness. Shar.*

OM_Shadowheart_COM_58.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_COM_58.text: ...Take my spear, step forward, and strike down the Selûnite.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_18.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_COM_18.text: ...Find my spear, step forward, and strike down the Selûnite.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_4.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_COM_4.text: Now go. Warm my blade with moon-crazed blood. And be wary of your companion - they pry in your thoughts.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_45.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_45.text: That wasn't for you to hear.
OM_Shadowheart_COM_45.context: CinematicNodeContext: The mindmeld connection severs abruptly as Shadowheart stands and glares at the player, furious.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_73.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_73.text: I deserve to know what I'm getting myself into.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_48.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_48.text: It's simple - I have a mission. It need not concern you - and as long as you don't interfere, it'll bring you no harm.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_5.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_5.text: When the time comes for me to do my duty, stand aside.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_71.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_71.text: Whatever you think you're going to do in there - forget it.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_56.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_56.text: It's simple. My Lady Shar demands a sacrifice. One life.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_37.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_37.text: Not that it matters, but her reward aligns with your own interests.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_65.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_65.text: We need to focus on our main goal.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_75.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_75.text: The tadpole, you mean? It's not that simple, not anymore. The Nightsinger herself has made her will known. She comes before all others.
OM_Shadowheart_COM_75.context: NodeContext: A little unsure. She understands this seems like a sudden course-correction.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_86.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_86.text: One life is too high a price.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_83.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_83.text: Please. How many breathed their last just so we could make it this far? Trust me. This will help us.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_25.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_25.text: Forget it. We're not going to sacrifice a life to Shar.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_23.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_23.text: You will not stand in my way. Draw your weapon.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_41.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_41.text: All right. Fine. Let's move on.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_55.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_55.text: Just remember what I said - let me do what I need to.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_44.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_44.text: No. Not yet. We can't go on - not without the Spear of Night. We must return to the library.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_31.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_31.text: Back to the library it is.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_42.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_42.text: I don't care about the spear - I'm continuing.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_82.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_82.text: My Lady does not want you to.
OM_Shadowheart_COM_82.context: NodeContext: Ultimatum/threat. She'll turn hostile if the player persists in ignoring her wishes here.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_50.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_50.text: Please. Don't make me do this - not after all we've been through.
OM_Shadowheart_COM_50.context: InternalNodeContext: This node only if SH meets a certain approval threshold of the playerNodeContext: Imploring someone she respects to change their mind, or she'll be forced to attack them

OM_Shadowheart_COM_78.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_78.text: Fine - we'll go look for the spear first.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_6.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_6.text: I'm glad you changed your mind. Otherwise that would have been the end for us. I don't want it to be the end.
OM_Shadowheart_COM_6.context: NodeContext: Genuine - she's relieved a player she has high respect for changed their minds. Otherwise it would have ended in combat

OM_Shadowheart_COM_35.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_35.text: Good. Somewhere in the library there should be an image of my Lady that we can shroud in darkness. The spear should reveal itself.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_0.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_0.text: I already gave you my answer - forget the spear.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_67.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_67.text: I'm sorry. I serve the Dark Lady. I'll dedicate the loss of you to her.
OM_Shadowheart_COM_67.context: NodeContext: Regretful, but she's still going to turn hostile to the player after this all the same.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_63.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_63.text: I gave you every chance. Now you've forced my hand.
OM_Shadowheart_COM_63.context: NodeContext: Hard-edged resignation. Turns hostile against the player after this.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_15.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_15.text: Let's calm down. We'll talk about it later.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_60.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_60.text: I'm sorry, I couldn't help myself.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_7.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_7.text: You're here to kill a child of Selûne - I heard it all. And I can't let that happen.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_61.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_61.text: You'd be wise to turn a blind eye. I won't fail - not when I'm this close.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_2.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_2.text: But I felt her presence - Lady Shar. Why did she choose you?

OM_Shadowheart_COM_12.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_12.text: It's not for me to question that - or for you. We live to serve.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_32.speaker: Narrator
OM_Shadowheart_COM_32.text: *You feel her mind flare in anger - she's sensed your intrusion.*

OM_Shadowheart_COM_66.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_66.text: Can't I even pray without interference?
OM_Shadowheart_COM_66.context: CinematicNodeContext: The mindmeld connection severs abruptly as Shadowheart stands and glares at the player, furious.NodeContext: Furious

OM_Shadowheart_COM_19.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_19.text: There's something you're not telling me.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_28.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_28.text: I'm sorry, I couldn't help myself.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_13.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_13.text: Yes, you could have. Don't pretend otherwise.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_20.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_20.text: There's something I need to do once we enter the Dark Lady's domain. Any more meddling on your part will end badly.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_81.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_81.text: There's something I need to do once we enter the Dark Lady's domain. Just don't interfere - it's important.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_62.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_62.text: There is something I need, before we continue - the Spear of Night. We can find it in the Library.
OM_Shadowheart_COM_62.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart opens her eyes, raises her head, and stands.NodeContext: Focused. She's just been commanded to to this by her goddess, who reached out to her through her thoughts. Arc: SH loyal to Shar.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_69.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_69.text: What? You just learned that while praying...?

OM_Shadowheart_COM_8.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_8.text: Lady Shar. She came to me as I prayed. She told me what needs to be done.
OM_Shadowheart_COM_8.context: NodeContext: Focused. She's just been commanded to to this by her goddess, who reached out to her through her thoughts. Arc: SH loyal to Shar.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_21.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_21.text: All right, no need to dash in ahead of me - I'm ready.
OM_Shadowheart_COM_21.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart opens her eyes, raises her head, and stands.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_59.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_59.text: Some prayers are answered more quickly than others. Let's continue.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_74.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_74.text: Nothing, just a show of respect. Trust me, you wouldn't want to displease her. Not here. Let's continue.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_47.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_47.text: We're not ready yet - we must find that spear.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_29.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_29.text: What do you need of me, my Lady?

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_12.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_12.text: The final threshold. You made it, Shadowheart - just as I knew you would. Now all you must do is step forwards, and the rest will prove simple.
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_12.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart kneels before the pool and bows her head reverentially as Shar's voice begins to speak to her telepathically

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_19.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_19.text: What do you need of me, my Lady?

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_5.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_5.text: Nothing that you are not more than capable of - the punishing of a wicked Selûnite. All you have to do is use the spear to end her light.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: You will become a Dark Justiciar, blessed with my power. You will become my voice to those who embrace me. And you will be my sword arm against those who would do me harm.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_34.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_34.text: I will do as you ask, Lady Shar.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_31.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_31.text: I know you will. Your faith is true, and when you strike this blow, a cleansing of my church will be unleashed, with you as my instrument.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_28.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_28.text: Such glory, for one life? Why is this one so important, my Lady?

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_9.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_9.text: She is a test of your loyalty. When you strike this blow, a cleansing of my church will be unleashed, with you as my instrument.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_10.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_10.text: You deserve this, Shadowheart, above all others. I wish all my followers had your spirit. Now onwards - warm my blade with the Selûnite's blood.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_32.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_32.text: Do not shame me with your doubts, child. I know your heart - your faith is true. When you strike this blow, a cleansing of my church will be unleashed, with you as my instrument.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_11.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_11.text: When you strike this blow, a cleansing of my church will be unleashed, with you as my instrument.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_22.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_22.text: I'm not sure I can continue.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_33.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_33.text: You can. I believe in you - now believe in yourself. Take my spear, step forward, and strike down the Selûnite who awaits beyond.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_21.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_21.text: Take my spear, step forward, and strike down the Selûnite who awaits beyond.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_26.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_26.text: A Selûnite sacrifice awaits beyond - but you must not approach her without the spear. Find it and wield it before you take another step.
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_26.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart kneels before the pool and bows her head reverentially as Shar's voice begins to speak to her telepathically NodeContext: Cautioning

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_20.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_20.text: I believe in you, Shadowheart. Wield the spear and receive your reward.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_8.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_8.text: Look to the library. It houses more than just knowledge.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_17.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_17.text: I have no need of the spear.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_6.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_6.text: No, Shadowheart. The spear is key. Retrieve it, so that I may embrace you.
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_6.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart standsNodeContext: Gentle reprimand
